name: iUS Institut für Umwelttechnologien und Strahlenschutz GmbH
goal: Consulting private organizations and public bodies, including national regulators and international organizations (EC, IAEA) on topics of environmental protection and radiation protection, knowledge management and decommissioning of nuclear and other hazardous facilities, abatement of hazardous substances and emergency preparedness.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
Euratom treaty
International Decommissioning Support Funds
H2020
Radiation protection legislation
